name: Fractulinear
description:
Our interactions with the physical world are guided by our perceptions. The many dimensions of our physical realm collapse when we experience them. Filtered down to what our brains can comprehend. There is tension there, sometimes failure, sometimes beauty.

Sometimes, things that appear broken are actually whole. And often, that’s just a matter of perspective.

Can you cross dimensions and close the loop?

How to play:

Keyboard:

WASD (or equivalent positions) to Move. IJKL (or equivalent positions) or Arrow Keys to Rotate.

Gamepad:

D-Pad to Move. Face Buttons (YBAX or equivalent) to Rotate.

Goal:

Guide the player circle to the square goal to complete the puzzle.

Known issues:

None.

Game by:

Jerry Verhoeven https://twitter.com/JerryVerhoeven

Music and Audio by:

Marc Straight https://twitter.com/MarcStraight
